reviews.review: Make it pay to play again
good fps game but with legit cheaters
JE TO PÍČOVINA JAK SVINA ALE HRAJU TO LUL
外挂太多了，已经找不到当初的感觉了！

Este jogo sem dúvida irá marcar-me para sempre pois é provavelmente o jogo que eu mais já joguei grande jogo. As únicas coisas que eu não gosto são os cheaters e o facto da criadora do jogo fazer sempre alguma bosta no jogo mas de resto adoro o jogo
É CS:GO, né?... Não tem o que reclamar. Porém eu remendaria mais estabilidade nos servidores e optimização gráfica.
дахуя читеров даже с праймом ну короч всё как всегда но бля этож кс пойду дальше рубится
Bardzo dobra gra lecz trzeba mieć mocne nerwy :)
Классная игра, подходит для разогрева перед жёстким мужским сексом
CSGO que mas decir GO GO
Recomendo, pois e um jogo bom para se divertirem e so nao gostei de alguns serveres nao registarem alguns tiros
Всегда приятно почувствывать во рту вкус залупы

This is a good game that the releasers take good care of, and has good mechanics that are easy to learn. Even though it looks like too much to handle you learn very quick. I think the main problem I have with the game is that it's very easy to get annoyed when you get killed by someone that you didn't see, and since that happens a lot in the game it's best if you don't have a short temper :b
Great game but making it free was uncool and horrible for the people who paid for the game
give me my fucking money back Gaben.
Simple yet very challenging game. Once you get good at it, you can't stop playing.
这个游戏入门系数较高，而且竞技模式需要战术配合跟人员意识磨合，需要有FPS速度反应供给。

Today i almost have 2500 hours in this amazing game.
And i must say, this is one of the best games out here.
This game can ruin your day, if you loose a game that you think you deserve to win.
But when i think back, on the countless games i have won, and on the countless laughs i have had, 
with both strangers, and friends. 
I asure you, i can recommend this game to everyone.
норм игра, что бы сорвать связки
Das Spiel ist was gutes für Leute die gerne Shooter spielen oder aimlastige spiele spielen
мне нравится эта игра из-за того что тут все решеет скилл

They don't ban cheaters but they ban me? Good job Valve. Don't play this game to be good at it if you don't want an OW ban... I 'm not the first one to mention this and I'm not the last one:
The core gameplay loop of counter strike (defusal) is one of the best there is.

Ok, You need 200 hours to get into the game and if you aren't a competitive player this might not be a game for you, but if you are, and you survive the cheater infestation and the toxicity all competitive games attract you're in for quite the ride :)
игра интересная и стало попадаться меньше агро школьников!!!!!!!!!!!
я хотел бы чтоб убрали прайм и нон прайм чтоб вернули старую систему и сделали старую цену.
